project_info.name: Folklorovich
project_info.content_strategy: Quality over quantity - 20 elite Russian superstitions with authentic cultural imagery

notes: This file tracks content generation metadata and statistics
cycle_order is shuffled at the start of each cycle to ensure variety
used_ids_this_cycle resets when all 20 entries have been used
Update this file after each successful generation
Version 2.0: Rebuilt with 20 elite Russian superstitions for quality-first approach
Each story is 80-100 words (25-30 second natural reading time)
Visual keywords focus on Russian cultural authenticity (wooden houses, Orthodox churches, folk art, birch forests, traditional crafts)
